00113 // ===========================================================================
00114 // method definitions

00116 // ------------ Conversion of SUMOVehicleClass
00117 
00118 std::string
00119 getVehicleClassCompoundName(int id) {
00120     std::string ret;
00121     const std::vector<std::string> names = SumoVehicleClassStrings.getStrings();
00122     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = names.begin(); it != names.end(); it++) {
00123         if ((id & SumoVehicleClassStrings.get(*it))) {
00124             ret += ("|" + *it);
00125         }
00126     }
00127     if (ret.length() > 0) {
00128         return ret.substr(1);
00129     } else {
00130         return ret;
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 std::string
00136 getVehicleClassNames(const SUMOVehicleClasses& ids) {
00137     std::ostringstream oss;
00138     bool hadOne = false;
00139     for (SUMOVehicleClasses::const_iterator i = ids.begin(); i != ids.end(); ++i) {
00140         if (hadOne) {
00141             oss << ' ';
00142         }
00143         oss << toString(*i);
00144         hadOne = true;
00145     }
00146     return oss.str();
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 SUMOVehicleClass
00151 getVehicleClassID(const std::string& name) {
00152     if (SumoVehicleClassStrings.hasString(name)) {
00153         return SumoVehicleClassStrings.get(name);
00154     }
00155     throw ProcessError("Unknown vehicle class '" + name + "'.");
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 int
00160 getVehicleClassCompoundID(const std::string& name) {
00161     int ret = SVC_UNKNOWN;
00162     const std::vector<std::string> names = SumoVehicleClassStrings.getStrings();
00163     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = names.begin(); it != names.end(); it++) {
00164         if (name.find(*it) != std::string::npos) {
00165             ret = ret | (int) SumoVehicleClassStrings.get(*it);
00166         }
00167     }
00168     return ret;
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 void
00173 parseVehicleClasses(
00174     const std::string& classNames,
00175     SUMOVehicleClasses& container) {
00176     StringTokenizer sta(classNames, " ");
00177     while (sta.hasNext()) {
00178         container.insert(getVehicleClassID(sta.next()));
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 void
00184 parseVehicleClasses(const std::string& allowedS,
00185                     const std::string& disallowedS,
00186                     SUMOVehicleClasses& allowed,
00187                     SUMOVehicleClasses& disallowed) {
00188     parseVehicleClasses(allowedS, allowed);
00189     parseVehicleClasses(disallowedS, disallowed);
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 void
00194 parseVehicleClasses(const std::vector<std::string> &classesS,
00195                     SUMOVehicleClasses& classes) {
00196     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator i = classesS.begin(); i != classesS.end(); ++i) {
00197         classes.insert(getVehicleClassID(*i));
00198     }
00199 }

00202 SUMOVehicleShape
00203 getVehicleShapeID(const std::string& name) {
00204     if (SumoVehicleShapeStrings.hasString(name)) {
00205         return SumoVehicleShapeStrings.get(name);
00206     } else {
00207         throw ProcessError("Unknown vehicle shape '" + name + "'.");
00208     }
00209 }

00212 std::string
00213 getVehicleShapeName(SUMOVehicleShape id) {
00214     return SumoVehicleShapeStrings.getString(id);

00218 // ------------ Conversion of SUMOEmissionClass
00219 SUMOEmissionClass
00220 getVehicleEmissionTypeID(const std::string& name) {
00221     try {
00222         if (name == "") {
00223             return SVE_UNKNOWN;
00224         } else if (name == "zero") {
00225             return SVE_ZERO_EMISSIONS;
00226         } else if (name.find("HDV_3_") == 0) {
00227             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_3_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00228         } else if (name.find("HDV_6_") == 0) {
00229             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_6_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00230         } else if (name.find("HDV_12_") == 0) {
00231             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_12_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00232         } else if (name.find("P_7_") == 0) {
00233             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_P_LDV_7_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00234         } else if (name.find("P_14_") == 0) {
00235             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_P_LDV_14_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00236         } else if (name.find("HDV_A0_3_") == 0) {
00237             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_A0_3_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00238         } else if (name.find("HDV_A0_6_") == 0) {
00239             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_A0_6_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00240         } else if (name.find("HDV_A0_12_") == 0) {
00241             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_HDV_A0_12_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00242         } else if (name.find("P_A0_7_") == 0) {
00243             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_P_LDV_A0_7_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00244         } else if (name.find("P_A0_14_") == 0) {
00245             return (SUMOEmissionClass)(SVE_P_LDV_A0_14_1 - 1 + TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.rfind("_") + 1).c_str()));
00246         }
00247     } catch (NumberFormatException&) {
00248     }
00249     throw ProcessError("Unknown emission type '" + name + "'.");
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00253 std::string
00254 getVehicleEmissionTypeName(SUMOEmissionClass id) {
00255     if (id == SVE_ZERO_EMISSIONS) {
00256         return "zero";
00257     }
00258     if (id < 0) {
00259         return "";
00260     } else if (id < 3) {
00261         return "HDV_3_" + toString(int(id));
00262     } else if (id < 3 + 6) {
00263         return "HDV_6_" + toString(int(id - 3));
00264     } else if (id < 3 + 6 + 12) {
00265         return "HDV_12_" + toString(int(id - 3 - 6));
00266     } else if (id < 3 + 6 + 12 + 7) {
00267         return "P_7_" + toString(int(id - 3 - 6 - 12));
00268     } else if (id < 3 + 6 + 12 + 7 + 14) {
00269         return "P_14_" + toString(int(id - 3 - 6 - 12 - 7));
00270     }
00271     return "";
00272 }
